    <div id="ctl00_pansidenav">
	
    <div id="sidenav">
        ﻿<h2><a href="http://rentonwa.gov/li.aspx?ItemID=1128">Arts and Entertainment</a></h2><ul><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=156" target="_self">Carco Theatre</a></li><li><a href="http://www.rentonwa.gov/living/default.aspx?id=11328" target="_self">Coulon Family Concert Series</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=152" target="_self">Renton City Concert Band</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=1694" target="_self">Renton Civic Theatre</a></li><li><a href="/rentonhistorymuseum/" target="_self">Renton History Museum</a></li><li><a href="http://rentonwa.gov/living/default.aspx?id=1570" target="_self">Renton Farmers Markets</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=1692" target="_self">Renton IKEA Performing Arts Center</a></li><li><a href="http://rentonwa.gov/living/default.aspx?id=28995" target="_self">Ivar's Clam Lights</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=5920" target="_self">Renton's July 4th</a></li><li><a href="/government/default.aspx?id=396" target="_self">Renton Municipal Arts Commission</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=402" target="_self">Renton's Public Art</a></li><li><a href="/li.aspx?ItemID=1138">Renton River Days</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=146" target="_self">Renton Youth Symphony Orchestra</a></li><li><a href="/living/default.aspx?id=5920">Renton's July 4th</a></li></ul>
    </div>
    
</div>
    <div id="center-column">
    <p id="crumbtrail">
    You are here
     : <a href="/living/">Living</a> 
  : <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=ID&amp;ItemID=2242">Recreation</a> 
  : <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=ID&amp;ItemID=156">Carco Theatre</a></p>

<a id="ctl00_hlPrintFriendly" href="http://rentonwa.gov/living/default.aspx?id=1128&amp;printfriendly=1&amp;sdate=8/27/2013&amp;edate=9/26/2013" target="_blank" style="display:inline-block;border-width:0px;"><img src="/images/print_friendly.gif" width="120" height="13" border="0" alt="Print Friendly Version" class="calpriall" /></a>
	


    <div id="ctl00_cphCenterColumn_cbMainContent">
	<h1>Arts and Entertainment</h1><p>Arts enthusiasts are increasingly attracted to Renton's thriving arts community.  Within Renton there are three facilities for the performing arts providing venues for two regional theatrical companies, the youth orchestra, the City Concert Band, the annual Summer Teen Musical, and visiting artists.</p>
<p>Visual arts abound in Renton.  The City has an impressive collection of <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=402">public art</a> accumulated largely through its one-percent for the arts program.  The City's history is on display at the <a href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=1220">Renton History Museum</a>, and the <a title="Carco Theatre" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=156">Carco Theatre</a> features work by <a title="Carco Theatre Artist Showing" href="/WorkArea/linkit.aspx?LinkIdentifier=id&amp;ItemID=8906">local artists on display</a> in the theatre lobby.  And, there are many arts organizations and businesses that feature the work of local artisans.</p>
<p>Summer and winter community special events provide entertainment and access to the arts for the whole family: </p>
<ul>
<li>Fall festivals and Storefront Scarecrows</li>
<li>Trick or Treats</li>
<li><a title="Ivar's Clam Lights" href="/living/default.aspx?id=28995">Ivar's Clam Lights</a> at Coulon Park</li>
<li>Hassle Free Holiday Bazaar</li>
<li>Visiting Santa's House</li>
<li>Kids Fishing Derby</li>
<li>The <a title="Renton Farmers Market " href="http://rentonfarmersmarket.com/" target="_blank">Renton Farmers Market </a>at the Piazza in downtown Renton is held every Tuesday from June through September. Vendors sell a bounty of fresh, locally grown farm products, including organic fruits and vegetables, cut flowers, baked goods, herbs, and more.</li>
</ul>
<p>For more information about other arts and entertainment opportunities, check out the <a title="Renton Municipal Arts Commission" href="/government/default.aspx?id=396">Renton Municipal Arts Commission</a>, <a title="South King County Cultural Coalition" href="http://www.sococulture.org/" target="_blank">South King County Cultural Coalition</a>, <a title="Evergreen City Ballet" href="http://www.evergreencityballet.org/" target="_blank">Evergreen City Ballet</a>, Allied Arts, <a title="Arts Unlimited" href="http://www.artsunlimited.org/" target="_blank">Arts Unlimited</a>.</p>

</div>
